name: Diver Obsession
description:
A short and creepy diving adventure. I would advise using full screen or downloading to windows verison if possiable. 

This game was made for Mini Jam 86 : Sports in 3 days and over 35 hours. Theme was sports so I picked scuba diving which is one of the most interesting sport in my eyes. And when you are diving and the limitation is "no stop" I obviously went for sharks that eat you when you stop.
